title: Add fictional-copyright disclaimer to bottom of Home page

requirements.text: Add a disclaimer at the very bottom of the Home page (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) in 14px font size with the following exact English text: "This is a 100 percent fictional organization that isnt in fallout or any games of fallout. all fallout works are copyrighted and owned by Bethesda Game Studios."

quotes: add to the home page at the bottom. in size 14 font.. this is 100 percent fictional organization that isnt in fallout or any games of fallout. all fallout works are copyrighted and owned by Bethesda Game Studios.

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the Home page shows the disclaimer as the last content on the page (below the existing Call to Action section).
The disclaimer text matches the user-provided wording exactly, including capitalization and punctuation.
The disclaimer is styled at 14px font size (e.g., Tailwind text-sm or an explicit 14px class) and remains readable in both light and dark themes.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not change shared SiteLayout navigation or footer behavior; add the disclaimer only within the Home page content.
nonGoals: Do not add disclaimers to other pages.
Do not change routing, navigation links, or any existing Home page copy besides adding the new disclaimer block.
